direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return collections derived from the same internal map, with similar control flows.
Both methods interact with the internal optionMap, one for adding options and the other for retrieving them.
Both methods involve querying or modifying the state related to options in the group.
Both methods handle option selection and may throw exceptions related to option selection.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding options to the group is necessary to have options available for retrieval.
Setting a selected option may affect the state before retrieving options.
Retrieving option names can be used to verify the correctness of the options retrieved.
Verifying the selected option can be part of the assertions for the retrieved options.
